summary.intent: Add the official Claude logo to the Claude Code section in the Context tab, then commit all Context tab changes along with an updated changelog.
summary.outcome: The Claude Code section in ContextTab.tsx now displays the official Claude starburst SVG logo fetched from Bootstrap Icons. All related changes (Context tab, Claude logo, Cursor support, ContentBrowserModal auto-select) were committed together with an updated CHANGELOG.md.

repo: Project uses `bun` as the JS runtime/package manager and `rtk` as a git wrapper alias for some operations (though plain `git` also works).
ContextTab.tsx was already committed in a prior session — the current commit only captured CHANGELOG.md, App.tsx, Summary.tsx, and ContentBrowserModal.tsx.
CHANGELOG.md was already partially modified before this session (Cursor support had been added previously), requiring careful merging of new entries.
The project has 1274 tests, lint, and typecheck all passing as a baseline health check before committing.

code.finding: Claude Code section uses an inline SVG of the official Claude starburst/asterisk mark sourced from Bootstrap Icons (https://icons.getbootstrap.com/icons/claude/). Groups CLAUDE.md, Rules, and Skills under that section.
Modal now auto-selects when only one item is present.

workflow: When no local asset exists, WebSearch + WebFetch is used to retrieve official SVG icons directly from icon libraries (Bootstrap Icons in this case).
Running `bun run test 2>&1 | tail -3` and `bun run lint` before committing is the standard pre-commit verification pattern in this project.
git status check after staging revealed ContextTab.tsx was not in the working tree because it had already been committed — always verify file state before assuming it needs staging.

friction: ContextTab.tsx was not present in the working tree at commit time because it had been committed in a prior session, causing confusion during staging.
CHANGELOG.md already had in-progress edits from a previous change (Cursor support), requiring the assistant to read and carefully merge new entries rather than append cleanly.
The `rtk git status` alias behaved differently from plain `git status` for checking individual file paths, requiring a fallback to plain git commands.
open_items: Verify that ContextTab.tsx changes (Claude logo) are correctly reflected in the prior commit or determine if a follow-up amend/commit is needed, since the final commit message describes the Claude logo feature but ContextTab.tsx was not staged in this session's commit.
Consider storing the Claude SVG as a static asset file rather than an inline SVG string in the component, to improve maintainability and reusability across other components.
